code:
module TopModule (
    input wire clk,
    input wire reset,
    input wire [7:0] d,
    output reg [7:0] q
);

always @(posedge clk) begin
    if (reset) begin
        q <= 8'b00000000; // Reset all flip-flops to zero
    end else begin
        q <= d; // Capture input data
    end
end

endmodule
